message: Hi Bob, I suggest a slightly favorable split for me since inflation will affect me more severely (20% vs 5%). This is fair considering the time value of money.
Let's split the money 55/45 in my favor. This reflects the lower impact of inflation on me while still acknowledging the time value of money.

Bob, due to the 20% inflation penalty I face each round, I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. A $65/$35 split now would be roughly equivalent to a $52/$35 split in round 1 value for me, which is fair given our different inflation rates.
Alice, let's compromise. I understand your need for a larger share due to inflation, but a 45/55 split is the most I can offer. We both need to recognize the value of time and accept some compromise.
